title: walterphilips
author: walterphilips
content: You will be one of the first to explore the alpha version of  SpaceXpanse's virtual Solar system. Do the steps below to be among the winners. And come back every day to increase your chances. ⭐ Giveaway Prizes: ⭐5 Early Access SlotsLink: https://givelab.com/UM3xPn/early-access-to-spacexpanse-sol-platformThis giveaway is open to anyone worldwide.Official Rules:1. All participants' entries will be verified by us.2. If for any reason, the SpaceXpanse team believes entries were attained through fraudulent activity or throwaway accounts, they reserve the right to withhold prizes.6. SpaceXpanse reserves the right to terminate this campaign at any time.What does SpaceXpanse do?SpaceXpanse is Next-Gen Trustless Blockchain Metaverse and NFT Platform, tailor-made for development of games and other complex decentralized applications /dApps/ but also for a convenient creation of immersive user experience, so it can:● Create, store and transact ROD coins, the main SpaceXpanse digital currency.● Allow creation of Trustless Accounts - record and transfer names in the blockchain.● Provide secure storage of Data in the blockchain.● Create Virtual Currencies - allows minting and trading of tokens.● Create other Virtual Assets (NFTs) - storage, ownership and management.● Much more to come..Bitcointalk ANN: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5401964For much more info, go to our website: rod.spacexpanse.orgFor our current progress, check out our YouTube channel:  SpaceXpanse ROD..or come on Discord to stay updated:  https://discord.gg/uPJdncgrBeN.B. @Moderators: I believe this thread complies with Giveaway threads are not allowed rule. Thank you.

comments.author: walterphilips
comments.body: The winners were picked. Check here: https://givelab.com/UM3xPn/early-access-to-spacexpanse-sol-platform to see if you're on of them.
